security: The document is redacted because the public disclosure of the redaction could reasonably be expected to constitute an unwarranted invasion of personal privacy, and that invasion of privacy would be so substantial that it outweighs the public interest.
summary: This document is a Final Determination Notification from the Assassination Records Review Board regarding HSCA staff payroll records, specifically concerning Lisa M. Berlow's employment. It includes payroll authorization forms detailing her appointments, salary, and related information, with Social Security numbers postponed due to privacy concerns.
summary_one_paragraph: This document consists of a Final Determination Notification from the Assassination Records Review Board and several payroll authorization forms related to Lisa M. Berlow's employment with the HSCA. The notification explains that the release of Berlow's Social Security number has been postponed to protect personal privacy, with a future review scheduled for 2017. The payroll forms detail Berlow's appointments, salary adjustments, and position as a researcher, authorized by Louis Stokes, Chairman, covering the period from June 1977 to December 1978, alongside a staff memorandum concerning payroll certification and relationships to members of Congress.
title: HSCA Staff Payroll Records: Lisa M. Berlow
